name: Rehabilitative Exercises
description: Low-impact exercises designed to strengthen weak areas and prevent injuries.

cards.title: Banded Glute Bridges for Hip Strength
cards.description: Strengthening the posterior chain and improving pelvic stability.
bulletpoints: Place a resistance band around the thighs
Press through the heels to lift the hips
Squeeze the glutes at the top and hold for a second
cards.summaryText: Drive hips upward against the band to wake glutes, stabilize pelvis, and support the lower back.

cards.title: Ankle Dorsiflexion Drills for Mobility
cards.description: Improving ankle mobility to enhance movement efficiency and prevent injuries.
bulletpoints: Sit with one leg extended and flex the foot upward
Hold the stretch for 10-15 seconds before releasing
Repeat on both sides to maintain balance
cards.summaryText: Pulse controlled dorsiflexion stretches to free ankle range and keep gait mechanics smooth.
